trends: There have been 66 other sightings in Jacksonville
There were no other sightings in Jacksonville on or around October 9th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details9:00 in the morning I was on my email, when my son and daughter ran in from the back porch saying they saw a kite. They routinely look in the sky and we watch planes and helicopters and they are excited by that. I started asking what kind of kite and they said at first it was a circle, then a ball. I immediately became curious. I started drawing shapes on a piece of paper like a triangular kite. And he said no. I drew a circle and he said no, then I drew a sphere and shaded a side of it, and my son said it looked like the sphere I drew. I asked what color it was and they started naming all of them. I then thought if this is shiny they might be seeing reflections. I held up my cell phone which has a metallic looking casing and asked my son if that was the color, and he said yes. He said it moved fast and slow. But what I gathered was it moved steady across the sky. He even told me exactly where his sister and he were standing and they both confirmed which way it went. I asked if it made a sound like a plane or helicopters, as we see those often where we live. They said no. In his own words, "we see airplanes and helicopters. It was different." They are 3 and a half years old and gave what i think is a pure description of what they saw.
Summary: Son and daughter said they saw a "kite"
